message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $14,000. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. Would you be willing to consider that?
Bob, I understand your position, but $11,000 is significantly below its value. How about we meet in the middle at $12,500?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. Would you be willing to go down to $11,500?
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  $11,500 is cutting it close, but I'm willing to accept if this will close the deal today.
